content: * the mittens are worked from top-down in the round so you don t have to make a separate swatch * this design comes with an arched gusset so the mittens fit like a glove this pattern is written for the magic loop method it is assumed that the stitches are divided evenly over two needles but you can easily adjust it for the double pointed needles as well **gauge notions needles** ------------------------------ **gauge ** 26 sts & 30 row per 4″ 10 cm in stranded colorwork after blocking **recommended needles ** us6 30″ 4mm 80cm circular needle and for the ribbing us4 30″ 3 5mm 80cm circular needle adjust needle size to obtain correct gauge **notions ** scrap yarn tapestry needle stitch marker crochet hook for the provisional cast-on **sizes** ----------------------- one size with a circumference of approximately 7 7″ 19 cm fits a medium woman s hand you can adjust the size of the mitten with needle size or yarn weight for bigger mittens take bigger needles and/or thicker yarn and vice versa the mitten comes with a gusset so they can be close-fitting **yarn** ----------------------- the sample is knitted with dk weight non-superwash wool novita suomivilla 100g = 248 yds / 226 m in colorway railo and natural white you can replace it with any dk weight wool yarn **yarn requirements ** 1 skein of novita suomivilla of both colors or approximately 248 yds 226 m of mc and 150 yds 136 m of cc note that the yardage may vary if your gauge differs
